data.title: Update: BLACKPINK's Rosé Surprises Girl's Day's Hyeri On Set Of Upcoming Historical Drama
data.meta_description: Updated June 10 KST: In addition to sending a coffee truck, BLACKPINK's Rosé prepared another surprise for Girl's Day's Hyeri! Hyeri uploaded images of
data.text:
Updated June 10 KST:

In addition to sending a coffee truck, BLACKPINK’s Rosé prepared another surprise for Girl’s Day’s Hyeri!

Hyeri uploaded images of Rosé visiting her on set of “Thinking of the Moon When the Flower Blooms” (literal title) in celebration of Hyeri’s birthday, which was on June 9.

Her caption reads, “Park Chaeng (short for Rosé’s real name Park Chae Young)… you… it is impossible to not love you. You who came with a giant bouquet of flowers while singing the ‘happy birthday’ song. I’m so touched. Thank you so, so much.”

Original Article:

Girl’s Day’s Hyeri showed off a sweet gift from BLACKPINK’s Rosé!

On June 10, she shared photos of herself with the coffee truck sent by Rosé. Rosé had sent the gift to Hyeri’s new historical drama “Thinking of the Moon When the Flower Blooms” (literal title). The top banner of the coffee truck reads, “Enjoy the churros, and I wish the drama will be a huge hit!” The banner on the side reads, “Everyone, churros and coffee are on Hyeri unnie today!! Good luck, ‘Thinking of the Moon When the Flower Blooms’!”

Hyeri wrote as the caption on Instagram, “Park Chae Young (Rosé’s real name) is awesome! My dongsaeng who always cheers for me like this. I love you. I’m so grateful that I’m crying.”

The two girl group members became close friends after Rosé made an appearance on “Amazing Saturday,” where Hyeri used to be a fixed cast member.

“Thinking of the Moon When the Flower Blooms” will take place during the period of the strongest prohibition laws in Joseon history, depicting human desire and proving that prohibition is not the best option. The main characters are an inspector from the Office of the Inspector-General who has left his hometown to achieve fame in the capital Hanyang and restore his family’s status, a poor aristocratic woman who begins to make alcohol in order to pay back her debt, and a crown prince who often secretly climbs over the walls of the palace to get a few drinks. The three people have a fateful encounter in front of a secret alcohol storage, gaining a secret that could lead to death if revealed.

Hyeri will be taking on the role of Kang Ro Seo, who begins to make alcohol in order to pay back her debt. Contrary to her aristocratic appearance, she’s a figure who’s not afraid of working hard to make money. Though people talk behind her back about how she’s losing face as an aristocrat, she’s the real head of her household who’s helping to support her older brother, the family’s only hope.

When you visit any web site, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. Site Functionality Cookies

We use cookies to verify your account and personalize your experience (e.g. these cookies can help Us keep you logged in as you navigate between Site pages).

Performance, Analytics and Research

We use cookies to collect information on how the Sites are used and to report on the Sites usage statistics for the improvement of Our services (e.g. these cookies can help Us count visits, page views, traffic sources, and better understand how you and other users use Our Sites, and identify features that could be improved).

Social Media

We use cookies that are set by a range of social media services that We have added to Our Sites to enable you to share Our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit (e.g. these cookies can help the social media services up a profile of your interests).

Advertising and Remarketing

We and our advertising partners may collect information using cookies to help make the advertising you see on the Sites and elsewhere on the internet more relevant to you, and to measure the effectiveness of the advertising on the Sites (e.g. these cookies can help Us and our advertising partners show you useful and relevant ads more effectively).
